- Payment by discount coupon

We open a new variety of online payment methods:
- Buy concession combo when booking online
- Pay with points and gift cards flexibly
- Redeem voucher and coupons for tickets and concessions
- Use partnership discount methods
- Redeem free tickets from promotions online
- Register voucher, coupon, gift card easily to online membership account
